explains: adj. 笨拙的；笨重的；不灵便的；难处理的

sentences.en: They came panting up to his door with their unwieldy baggage.
sentences.cn: 他们带着笨重的行李，气喘吁吁地来到他的门口。

sentences.en: The benefits system is complicated and unwieldy and needs reforming.
sentences.cn: 福利制度十分庞大复杂且难以控制，亟需改革。

sentences.en: It is hard to see how this improves competition, but it does chime with the views of many investors that ING's conglomerate model is too unwieldy.
sentences.cn: 很难看出这将如何增强竞争，但它与许多投资者的观点一致，即 ING 的企业集团模式过于笨重了。
